file_insights.impact: Changes date/time display logic from using startTime/endTime fields to scheduledDate field

patterns_discovered.description: All instances of meeting.startTime and meeting.endTime were replaced with meeting.scheduledDate
Same field replacements made in two distinct code blocks (lines 166-174 and 300-308)
patterns_discovered.significance: Indicates parallel data structures or duplicate rendering logic

patterns_discovered.description: Previous format displayed start and end times separately; new format only displays scheduledDate
patterns_discovered.impact: UI change from 'HH:MM - HH:MM' format to single time value

gotchas_discovered.description: Line 173 and 307 change from displaying both startTime and endTime to only displaying scheduledDate. The format string suggests startTime was being used to show a time range, but scheduledDate appears to be a date field, not a time range.
gotchas_discovered.risk: Meeting time range information may be lost or misrepresented in UI

gotchas_discovered.description: Replacing endTime field entirely with scheduledDate suggests either: (1) scheduledDate contains time components, or (2) the original logic was incorrect. formatTime() function is still being called on scheduledDate.
gotchas_discovered.risk: formatTime() function may not handle date fields correctly

gotchas_discovered.description: scheduledDate field appears to be used for both date and time display purposes, blurring separation of concerns
gotchas_discovered.risk: Future maintenance difficulty if time and date need separate handling

approach_outcome.description: All instances of startTime/endTime were replaced with scheduledDate in both display sections
approach_outcome.issues_encountered: Potential logical error in time range display not caught during implementation

recommendations.recommendation: Verify that scheduledDate field contains both date and time components, and that formatTime() function correctly handles date fields
recommendations.rationale: The change removed end time display entirely, which may break meeting duration visibility

recommendations.recommendation: Add unit/integration tests to verify the displayed time format matches intended behavior
recommendations.rationale: The semantic change from time range to single time value needs validation

recommendations.recommendation: Review data model to understand whether startTime, endTime, and scheduledDate are redundant or serve different purposes
recommendations.rationale: Current change suggests data model confusion about which fields represent what

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting date/time display logic into a separate component or utility function to DRY up the duplicate code blocks
recommendations.rationale: Lines 166-174 and 300-308 contain identical display logic
